Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by Ilean3 how soon can radiation start after lumpectomy, and how long can you wait with out missing the window It depends on your situation, my radiologist says within a couple of weeks usually you can start. But if you have chemo they usually do it first I think. I had a different kind of radiation called mammosite, it happens before chemo and within a couple weeks of surgery for the lumpectomy. It lasted 5 days only. Then I started chemo. Talk with your doctor don't let too much time go by before you do, it can make things harder for you.
Posts.Title: when does radiation start after lumpectomy
